EmailTemplate.name: Post-Launch Congratulations
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on the successful launch of your new website!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on the recent launch of your new website! üéâ
